com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.server.adapter

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.server.adapter.Converter

  • public final class Converter
extends Object
    The class Converter converts objects between v4 Service and Java SDK classes.
